description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows workstation service elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38050), it is essential to apply the relevant updates.

1. Identify your system's build number to ensure compatibility with the update.
2. Download and apply the following KB updates according to your version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: Install [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442).
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: Install [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442).
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: Install [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431).
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: Install [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427).

**Details**:
These updates address an integer underflow vulnerability that could potentially escalate user privileges. Users should ensure that critical data is backed up prior to installation. After applying the updates, it is advisable to restart the system to complete the installation process effectively.
